onboarding.track_finances_desc: Easily record and categorize your income and expenses to keep track of where your money goes.
onboarding.set_budgets_desc: Create monthly budgets for different categories and stay on top of your spending habits.
onboarding.achieve_goals_desc: Set financial goals and track your progress as you work towards achieving them.
